card.name: Attended Knight
card.property: First strike When Attended Knight enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The virtues of knighthood are best taught in the field.

card.name: Banishing Stroke
card.property: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library. Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Blade Splicer
card.property: When Blade Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token. Golem creatures you control have first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flesh is a betrayal of the self."

card.name: Entreat the Angels
card.property: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying. Miracle {X}{W}{W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Eyes in the Skies
card.property: Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to."—Zunak, Selesnya strategist

card.name: Flickerwisp
card.property: Flying When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings disturb more than air.

card.name: Gideon's Lawkeeper
card.property: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The essence of a lawful society is swift deterrence."

card.name: Graceful Reprieve
card.property: When target creature dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In my moment of death, I had a vision of the world, dark and unwelcoming. I wanted to hide in the deepest meander, but the light pulled me back."

card.name: Intangible Virtue
card.property: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In life, they were a motley crew: farmers, lords, cutpurses, priests. In death, they are united in singular, benevolent purpose.

card.name: Kor Hookmaster
card.property: When Kor Hookmaster enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."

card.name: Kor Skyfisher
card.property: Flying When Kor Skyfisher enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sometimes I snare the unexpected, but I know its purpose will be revealed in time."

card.name: Lingering Souls
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Flashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.

card.name: Linvala, Keeper of Silence
card.property: Flying Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who seek to disturb the harmony of life will see their instruments taken from them.

card.name: Lone Missionary
card.property: When Lone Missionary enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His mission has become a grim pilgrimage, a tour of the Eldrazi-stricken outposts across Zendikar. But he marches on alone, stubborn as the daily dawn.

card.name: Master Splicer
card.property: When Master Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token. Golem creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With Phyrexia's victory at hand, each sect began perfecting its vision.

card.name: Momentary Blink
card.property: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control. Flashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Path to Exile
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

card.name: Pitfall Trap
card.property: If exactly one creature is attacking, you may pay {W} rather than pay Pitfall Trap's mana cost. Destroy target attacking creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each spike is poisoned—the trapmaker's idea of mercy.

card.name: Ranger of Eos
card.property: When Ranger of Eos enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to two creature cards with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At his side, humble beasts become weapons more deadly than sharpened steel.

card.name: Restoration Angel
card.property: Flash Flying When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Rootborn Defenses
card.property: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

card.name: Séance
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, you may exile target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Sensor Splicer
card.property: When Sensor Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token. Golem creatures you control have vigilance.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With clarity of vision comes clarity of function.

card.name: Soul Warden
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."

card.name: Stony Silence
card.property: Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The relic's purpose? Its design? Whatever the intent, it is now a mere curiosity that breaks up the horizon.

card.name: Terminus
card.property: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries. Miracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Urbis Protector
card.property: When Urbis Protector enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Guilds be damned. We can fend for ourselves."—Vennick of the Gateless

card.name: Wake the Reflections
card.property: Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You see a bird, an oak, a packbeast. I see the potential for an army."—Lalia, Selesnya dryad

card.name: Youthful Knight
card.property: First strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die."—Oracle en-Vec

card.name: Augur of Bolas
card.property: When Augur of Bolas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Azure Mage
card.property: {3} {U}: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We draw our power from the infinite ocean of the mind, where all manner of things can be conceived."—Azure creed

card.name: Cackling Counterpart
card.property: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control. Flashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Compulsive Research
card.property: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless he or she discards a land card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

card.name: Crippling Chill
card.property: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One breath of the geist turns veins to rivers of ice and freezes hearts midbeat.

card.name: Cyclonic Rift
card.property: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.

card.name: Deadeye Navigator
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Deadeye Navigator is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{1}{U}: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under your control."

card.name: Familiar's Ruse
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Familiar's Ruse, return a creature you control to its owner's hand. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Because of their capricious nature, faeries can serve as living lenses for disruptive magic.

card.name: Forbidden Alchemy
card.property: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Ghostly Flicker
card.property: Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes it's useful to take a break from existence.

card.name: Gifts Ungiven
card.property: Search your library for up to four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Grasp of Phantoms
card.property: Put target creature on top of its owner's library. Flashback {7}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.

card.name: Mist Raven
card.property: Flying When Mist Raven enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you see a raven, head for the hills. It knows when the ghost-tide is headed in."—Sved, fisherman of Nephalia

card.name: Mystical Teachings
card.property: Search your library for an instant card or a card with flash, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library. Flashback {5}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Opportunity
card.property: Target player draws four cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."

card.name: Phantasmal Image
card.property: You may have Phantasmal Image enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an Illusion in addition to its other types and it gains "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

card.name: Rewind
card.property: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best denials are simply that: a beginning and end unchanged, a dream with no memory."

card.name: Sea Gate Oracle
card.property: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Serum Visions
card.property: Draw a card. Scry 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Serum was once derived from Mirrodin's blinkmoths, offering visions of inspiration. Now it is pulled from Phyrexian inkmoths, yielding visions of perfection.

card.name: Snapcaster Mage
card.property: Flash When Snapcaster Mage enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Spell Pierce
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's a hole in your plan."—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

card.name: Spire Monitor
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each monitor is given an eye for each spire it is to guard.

card.name: Tandem Lookout
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Tandem Lookout is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, draw a card."

card.name: Temporal Mastery
card.property: Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Temporal Mastery. Miracle {1}{U} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Venser, Shaper Savant
card.property: Flash When Venser, Shaper Savant enters the battlefield, return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His marvels of artifice pale in comparison to the developing machinery of his mind.

card.name: Wall of Frost
card.property: Defender Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I welcome it. The pasture is cleared of weeds and the wolves are frozen solid."—Lumi, goatherd

card.name: Wing Splicer
card.property: When Wing Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token. Golem creatures you control have flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Progress is our great inheritance, perfection our ultimate destination."

card.name: Wingcrafter
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Wingcrafter is paired with another creature, both creatures have flying.

card.name: Abyssal Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever Abyssal Specter deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It rides to a chorus of whispers that are more felt than heard.

card.name: Bone Splinters
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Bone Splinters, sacrifice a creature. Destroy target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.

card.name: Corpse Connoisseur
card.property: When Corpse Connoisseur enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card and put that card into your graveyard. If you do, shuffle your library. Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Cower in Fear
card.property: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will fully understand fear when you discover it is the final thing you put your faith in."—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Damnation
card.property: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Death's Shadow
card.property: Death's Shadow gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shadow of the candle looms tall even as its light grows dim.

card.name: Delirium Skeins
card.property: Each player discards three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There came a rush, a sudden fire in the mind. Then the two saw only the sooty fog of madness, heard only the crackling of their last thoughts burning away.

card.name: Desecration Demon
card.property: Flying At the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Desecration Demon and put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Dregscape Zombie
card.property: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.

card.name: Entomber Exarch
card.property: When Entomber Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one — • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. • Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Extractor Demon
card.property: Flying Whenever another creature leaves the battlefield, you may have target player put the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Unearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Falkenrath Noble
card.property: Flying Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."

card.name: Gnawing Zombie
card.property: {1} {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On still nights you can hear its rotted teeth grinding tirelessly on scavenged bones.

card.name: Griselbrand
card.property: Flying, lifelink Pay 7 life: Draw seven cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn emerged from the broken Helvault, but her freedom came at a price—him."—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

card.name: Grisly Spectacle
card.property: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Grixis Slavedriver
card.property: When Grixis Slavedriver leaves the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Unearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Inquisition of Kozilek
card.property: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the awakening of the Eldrazi, some vampires took it upon themselves to remind the others where their loyalty should lie.

card.name: Liliana of the Veil
card.property: +1: Each player discards a card. −2: Target player sacrifices a creature. −6: Separate all permanents target player controls into two piles. That player sacrifices all permanents in the pile of his or her choice.

card.name: Mind Shatter
card.property: Target player discards X cards at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dark thoughts hatch and twist within the mind, straining to take wing.

card.name: Mortician Beetle
card.property: Whenever a player sacrifices a creature, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Mortician Beetle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To the soldier, war is famine; to the scavenger, a feast.

card.name: Night Terrors
card.property: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Innistrad is a place where dreams invade the mind and mere shadows exact a terrible toll.

card.name: Ogre Jailbreaker
card.property: Defender Ogre Jailbreaker can attack as though it didn't have defender as long as you control a Gate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took three years for it to occur to him to use the chain as a weapon, but once it did, he made up for lost time.

card.name: Pit Keeper
card.property: When Pit Keeper enters the battlefield, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The undead are not 'awakened.' They are evicted when there is no room left in the pit for more bodies."

card.name: Recover
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wisdom from the past is best gathered directly from the source."

card.name: Seal of Doom
card.property: Sacrifice Seal of Doom: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A basilisk's gaze is effective, but disposing of physical remains is a tiresome task. It's far more discreet to dissolve one's victim entirely."—Szadek

card.name: Sever the Bloodline
card.property: Exile target creature and all other creatures with the same name as that creature. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Unburial Rites
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All crave the Blessed Sleep. Few receive it.

card.name: Vampire Aristocrat
card.property: Sacrifice a creature: Vampire Aristocrat gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I admit, I am a creature of the city. The sights, the nightly excitement, the abundance of fine drink . . ."

card.name: Vampire Nighthawk
card.property: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As they fought the Eldrazi, many vampires learned to live among humans. Others were unable to make the adjustment.

card.name: Ancient Grudge
card.property: Destroy target artifact. Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If there's anything a werewolf hates, it's a collar—especially Avacyn's Collar, the symbol of her church.

card.name: Battle-Rattle Shaman
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

card.name: Blood Moon
card.property: Nonbasic lands are Mountains.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heavy light flooded across the landscape, cloaking everything in deep crimson.

card.name: Bonfire of the Damned
card.property: Bonfire of the Damned deals X damage to target player and each creature he or she controls. Miracle {X}{R} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Chandra's Outrage
card.property: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

card.name: Dragon Fodder
card.property: Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblins journey to the sacrificial peaks in pairs so that the rare survivor might be able to relate the details of the other's grisly demise.

card.name: Dynacharge
card.property: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Overload {2}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nothing evens the odds like a little lightning.

card.name: Goblin Assault
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Goblin creatures attack each turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A goblin raid is a delicate gambit—a blend of stealth, precision, and screaming death.

card.name: Goblin Guide
card.property: Haste Whenever Goblin Guide attacks, defending player reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's a land card, that player puts it into his or her hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've been all over this world. I even remember some of those places."

card.name: Hanweir Lancer
card.property: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.) As long as Hanweir Lancer is paired with another creature, both creatures have first strike.

card.name: Hellrider
card.property: Haste Whenever a creature you control attacks, Hellrider deals 1 damage to defending player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Behind every devil's mayhem lurks a demon's scheme."—Rem Karolus, Blade of the Inquisitors

card.name: Madcap Skills
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has menace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The larger the crowd, the harder it is for them to run away.

card.name: Magma Jet
card.property: Magma Jet deals 2 damage to target creature or player. Scry 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some Akroans make the dangerous pilgrimage to the volcanic temples of Purphoros, where oracles known as flamespeakers glean omens from lava.

card.name: Mizzium Mortars
card.property: Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control. Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

card.name: Mogg Flunkies
card.property: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They'll attack whatever's in front of them—as long as you tell them where that is.

card.name: Molten Rain
card.property: Destroy target land. If that land was nonbasic, Molten Rain deals 2 damage to the land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It came as a cruel answer to the farmers' prayers.

card.name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
card.property: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

card.name: Past in Flames
card.property: Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. Flashback {4}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Pyrewild Shaman
card.property: Bloodrush — {1}{R}, Discard Pyrewild Shaman: Target attacking creature gets +3/+1 until end of turn. Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if Pyrewild Shaman is in your graveyard, you may pay {3}. If you do, return Pyrewild Shaman to your hand.

card.name: Pyroclasm
card.property: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Who'd want to ignite things one at a time?"—Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Pyromancer Ascension
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that has the same name as a card in your graveyard, you may put a quest counter on Pyromancer Ascension. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell while Pyromancer Ascension has two or more quest counters on it, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Rubblebelt Maaka
card.property: Bloodrush — {R}, Discard Rubblebelt Maaka: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The maaka remain loyal to us in this time of strife. We don't even have to feed them—our enemies do."—Nedja, Gruul shaman

card.name: Scorched Rusalka
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Scorched Rusalka deals 1 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each small blaze she sets jogs her memory, letting her piece together the mystery of her own fiery end.

card.name: Scourge Devil
card.property: When Scourge Devil enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Unearth {2}{R} ({2}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Skirsdag Cultist
card.property: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Skirsdag Cultist deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Within blood is life. Within life is fire. Within fire is the path to our masters' glory!"

card.name: Thunderous Wrath
card.property: Thunderous Wrath deals 5 damage to target creature or player. Miracle {R} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

card.name: Traitorous Instinct
card.property: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. Until end of turn, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The horror lurched about like a puppet from a madman's nightmare, squeezing the life from its own kind.

card.name: Vithian Stinger
card.property: {T}: Vithian Stinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Unearth {1}{R} ({1}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Zealous Conscripts
card.property: Haste When Zealous Conscripts enters the battlefield, gain control of target permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Arachnus Spinner
card.property: Reach Tap an untapped Spider you control: Search your graveyard and/or library for a card named Arachnus Web and put it onto the battlefield attached to target creature. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Arachnus Web
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated. At the beginning of the end step, if enchanted creature's power is 4 or greater, destroy Arachnus Web.

card.name: Avacyn's Pilgrim
card.property: {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Avacyn's protection is everywhere. From the holy church to the sacred glade, all that we see is under her blessed watch."

card.name: Baloth Cage Trap
card.property: If an opponent had an artifact enter the battlefield under his or her control this turn, you may pay {1}{G} rather than pay Baloth Cage Trap's mana cost. Create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Call of the Herd
card.property: Create a 3/3 green Elephant creature token. Flashback {3}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Craterhoof Behemoth
card.property: Haste When Craterhoof Behemoth enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Death-Hood Cobra

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Size alone does not guarantee survival."—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Druid's Deliverance
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "So many oppose us, but we are the reed that bends without breaking."

card.name: Explore
card.property: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.

card.name: Fists of Ironwood
card.property: Enchant creature When Fists of Ironwood enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens. Enchanted creature has trample.

card.name: Gaea's Anthem
card.property: Creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To those who can hear it, Gaea's battle song brings power as swift as sunlight and as enduring as the deep roots of the forest."—Gamelen, Citanul elder

card.name: Harmonize
card.property: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life's greatest lessons don't come from focus or concentration. They come from breathing and simply noticing."—Seton, centaur druid

card.name: Hungry Spriggan
card.property: Trample Whenever Hungry Spriggan attacks, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If a spriggan's eyes are larger than its stomach, it has ways to remedy the situation.

card.name: Might of Old Krosa
card.property: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Krosa the great. Krosa the enduring. Look to the forest, and it will share its bounty."—Zyd, Kamahlite druid

card.name: Penumbra Spider
card.property: Reach When Penumbra Spider dies, create a 2/4 black Spider creature token with reach.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it snared a passing cockatrice, its own soul darkly doubled.

card.name: Primal Command
card.property: Choose two — • Target player gains 7 life. • Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library. • Target player shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library. • Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Revive
card.property: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even what is lost beyond recall returns when coaxed by a dryad's hand.

card.name: Scavenging Ooze
card.property: {G}: Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on Scavenging Ooze and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In nature, not a single bone or scrap of flesh goes to waste.

card.name: Seal of Primordium
card.property: Sacrifice Seal of Primordium: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I am the simplifier, the root that drags all artifice to earth."—Seal inscription

card.name: Slaughterhorn
card.property: Bloodrush — {G}, Discard Slaughterhorn: Target attacking creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov clergy would never cross its path, but sending thrull couriers to do so is cheap and entertaining.

card.name: Slime Molding
card.property: Create an X/X green Ooze creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Give me enough refuse and mana and I will summon an ooze that can engulf all of Ravnica."—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

card.name: Strength in Numbers
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hermit dies. The outcast dies. The lone wolf dies. Only those who stick together survive this world."—Uros, Pendelhaven elder

card.name: Summoning Trap
card.property: If a creature spell you cast this turn was countered by a spell or ability an opponent controlled, you may pay {0} rather than pay Summoning Trap's mana cost. Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Sylvan Ranger
card.property: When Sylvan Ranger enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Not all paths are found on the forest floor."

card.name: Tarmogoyf
card.property: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What doesn't grow, dies. And what dies grows the tarmogoyf.

card.name: Thornscape Battlemage
card.property: Kicker {R} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {R} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.) When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {R} kicker, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player. When Thornscape Battlemage enters the battlefield, if it was kicked with its {W} kicker, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Thragtusk
card.property: When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life. When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Ulvenwald Tracker
card.property: {1} {G}, {T}: Target creature you control fights another target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Peace will come to Innistrad, but only after all abominations have been dealt with, one by one."

card.name: Vital Splicer
card.property: When Vital Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token. {1}: Regenerate target Golem you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For every one that falls, ten shall rise. The revelation of New Phyrexia is at hand."—Vorinclex, Voice of Hunger

card.name: Abrupt Decay
card.property: Abrupt Decay can't be countered by spells or abilities. Destroy target nonland permanent with converted mana cost 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet quickly suspended their policy of lifetime guarantees.

card.name: Advent of the Wurm
card.property: Create a 5/5 green Wurm creature token with trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The consciousness of Mat'Selesnya does not always spread in peaceful ways.

card.name: Aethermage's Touch
card.property: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. It gains "At the beginning of your end step, return this creature to its owner's hand." Then put the rest of the cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Agent of Masks
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.

card.name: Agony Warp
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn. Target creature gets -0/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life's circle has become inverted in Grixis. The same energy is endlessly recycled and becomes more stagnant with each pass.

card.name: Auger Spree
card.property: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!"—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

card.name: Bronzebeak Moa
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Bronzebeak Moa gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They fight for their home with more loyalty than any conscript.

card.name: Broodmate Dragon
card.property: Flying When Broodmate Dragon enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Frozen in fear, the goblins stared upward at the circling hunter—and were promptly eaten by its diving mate.

card.name: Call of the Conclave
card.property: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.

card.name: Carnage Gladiator
card.property: Whenever a creature blocks, that creature's controller loses 1 life. {1}{B}{R}: Regenerate Carnage Gladiator.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not the foulest or bloodiest act at Rix Maadi by a stretch.

card.name: Centaur Healer
card.property: When Centaur Healer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.

card.name: Coiling Oracle
card.property: When Coiling Oracle enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.

card.name: Cruel Ultimatum
card.property: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is always a greater power.

card.name: Deputy of Acquittals
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Deputy of Acquittals enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Dinrova Horror
card.property: When Dinrova Horror enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Welcome to the Dimir Public Offices. Not responsible for death or loss of property. Basement off-limits."—Sign outside Dinrova Building

card.name: Domri Rade
card.property: +1: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. −2: Target creature you control fights another target creature. −7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have double strike, trample, hexproof, and haste."

card.name: Evil Twin
card.property: You may have Evil Twin enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it gains "{U}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with the same name as this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You can always tell the evil one by the dagger he's sticking in you.

card.name: Falkenrath Aristocrat
card.property: Flying, haste Sacrifice a creature: Falkenrath Aristocrat gains indestructible until end of turn. If the sacrificed creature was a Human, put a +1/+1 counter on Falkenrath Aristocrat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your blood is quite pleasing. A pity there's not enough for both of us."

card.name: Fiery Justice
card.property: Fiery Justice deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Target opponent gains 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the rebels couldn't breach the castle to kill Lalor the Obstinate, they tried a more internal approach to depose the pretender king.

card.name: Ghor-Clan Rampager
card.property: Trample Bloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard Ghor-Clan Rampager: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?"—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

card.name: Goblin Electromancer
card.property: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When asked how much power is required, Izzet mages always answer "more."

card.name: Golgari Germination
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Golgari don't bury their dead. They plant them.

card.name: Golgari Rotwurm
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like corpse-worms through a carapace, rotwurms slide through the hollowed bones of the undercity.

card.name: Ground Assault
card.property: Ground Assault deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Taking down a dragon is easy. All you need is enough space to get in a good swing."—Narbulg Nine Fingers

card.name: Gruul War Chant
card.property: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 and have menace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are the heart of the wild, the fire in its eyes, and the howl in its throat. Come, join the battle to which you were born."—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman

card.name: Izzet Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}. • Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature. • Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

card.name: Kathari Bomber
card.property: Flying When Kathari Bomber deals combat damage to a player, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens and sacrifice Kathari Bomber. Unearth {3}{B}{R} ({3}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Moroii
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Touched by moroii"—Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"

card.name: Mystic Genesis
card.property: Counter target spell. Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Simic can grow anything out of a puddle of sludge. I just hope they never join forces with the Golgari."—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

card.name: Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius
card.property: Flying Whenever Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals damage to a player, you may draw a card. {U}{R}: Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has no patience for minds that do not inspire him or explode by trying.

card.name: Obzedat, Ghost Council
card.property: When Obzedat, Ghost Council enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. At the beginning of your end step, you may exile Obzedat. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste.

card.name: Olivia Voldaren
card.property: Flying {1}{R}: Olivia Voldaren deals 1 damage to another target creature. That creature becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types. Put a +1/+1 counter on Olivia Voldaren. {3}{B}{B}: Gain control of target Vampire for as long as you control Olivia Voldaren.

card.name: Pilfered Plans
card.property: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mirko Vosk hunted anyone with knowledge of the maze, draining the chances of the other guilds.

card.name: Putrefy
card.property: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are all decaying, always in a state of near-death. One moment without breath and we begin to break down."—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

card.name: Rhox War Monk
card.property: Lifelink

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rhox monks are dedicated to spiritual growth and learning, and most bear the sigils of many students. However, they do not gladly suffer fools or those who disagree with their carefully wrought dogma.

card.name: Sedraxis Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever Sedraxis Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card. Unearth {1}{B} ({1}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Simic Sky Swallower
card.property: Flying, trample Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've bred out the shortcomings of the species' natural form and replaced them with assets of our own design."—Momir Vig

card.name: Sin Collector
card.property: When Sin Collector enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose an instant or sorcery card from it and exile that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That must weigh heavily on your soul. Let me purge it for you."

card.name: Skyknight Legionnaire
card.property: Flying, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not know which gives me more pride: the legions of soldiers marching in thunderous lockstep, or the cry of the skyknights riding their rocs like jagged lightning overhead."—Razia

card.name: Soul Manipulation
card.property: Choose one or both — • Counter target creature spell. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Birth and death are both reversible."—Nicol Bolas

card.name: Soul Ransom
card.property: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Discard two cards: Soul Ransom's controller sacrifices it, then draws two cards. Only any opponent may activate this ability.

card.name: Sphinx's Revelation
card.property: You gain X life and draw X cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let the knowledge of absolute law inspire you to live a life of absolute order."

card.name: Spike Jester
card.property: Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Rakdos, "suicidal charge" and "good showmanship" are one and the same.

card.name: Sprouting Thrinax
card.property: When Sprouting Thrinax dies, create three 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The vast network of predation on Jund has actually caused some strange creatures to adapt to being eaten.

card.name: Stoic Angel
card.property: Flying, vigilance Players can't untap more than one creature during their untap steps.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the most battle-hardened soldiers pause in her presence for a moment of introspection.

card.name: Sunhome Guildmage
Talon Trooper
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The volcanic winds make a maze of the skies of Jund. If we mean to invade, we must first learn their invisible paths."

card.name: Teleportal
card.property: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. Overload {3}{U}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

card.name: Terminate
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Thundersong Trumpeter
card.property: {T}: Target creature can't attack or block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hear that? Those notes mean we've arrived at Sunhome! Let our allies' hearts soar and our enemies' hearts shatter at the sound!"—Klattic, Boros legionnaire

card.name: Tower Gargoyle
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Esper, like any work of art, can be truly appreciated only from a distance."—Tezzeret

card.name: Unflinching Courage
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As Trostani's influence grew, vitality spread through the Conclave—much to the other guilds' dismay.

card.name: Urban Evolution
card.property: Draw three cards. You may play an additional land this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Simic released more of their krasis experiments, they required new habitats, always at the expense of the locals.

card.name: Vanish into Memory
card.property: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Voice of Resurgence
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn or when Voice of Resurgence dies, create a green and white Elemental creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

card.name: Wall of Denial
card.property: Defender, flying Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It provides what every discerning mage requires—time to think.

card.name: Wayfaring Temple
card.property: Wayfaring Temple's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control. Whenever Wayfaring Temple deals combat damage to a player, populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One of the most ferocious and deadly gargantuans, the thoctar never sees its worshippers, but it often awakens surrounded by gifts and sacrifices.

card.name: Zur the Enchanter
card.property: Flying Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.

card.name: Aethertow
card.property: Put target attacking or blocking creature on top of its owner's library. Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose a new target for the copy.)

card.name: Boros Reckoner
card.property: Whenever Boros Reckoner is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target creature or player. {R/W}: Boros Reckoner gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Imagine a thunderstorm that's also a tactical genius. That's him."—Dars Gostok, Firefist captain

card.name: Burning-Tree Emissary
card.property: When Burning-Tree Emissary enters the battlefield, add {R}{G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who regard the Gruul as savage simpletons underestimate the subtle power of their shamans.

card.name: Giantbaiting
card.property: Create a 4/4 red and green Giant Warrior creature token with haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)

card.name: Gift of Orzhova
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying and lifelink.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Remember by whose gift you ascend."—Milana, Orzhov prelate

card.name: Mistmeadow Witch

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Olka collected the evening mist for years, studying its secrets. Once she learned its essence, she could vanish with a thought.

card.name: Sundering Growth
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One day every pillar will be a tree and every hall a glade."—Trostani

card.name: Tattermunge Witch
card.property: {R} {G}: Each blocked creature gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Tattermunge gang has no words for the spell that whips their instinctual rage into a frenzy. They only know they like it.

card.name: Torrent of Souls
card.property: Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield if {B} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. Creatures target player controls get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn if {R} was spent to cast Torrent of Souls. (Do both if {B}{R} was spent.)

card.name: Wort, the Raidmother
card.property: When Wort, the Raidmother enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 red and green Goblin Warrior creature tokens. Each red or green instant or sorcery spell you cast has conspire. (As you cast the spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it and you may choose new targets for the copy.)

card.name: Azorius Signet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law—strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

card.name: Basilisk Collar
card.property: Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink. Equip {2}

property.name: Flavor
property.value: During their endless travels, the mages of the Goma Fada caravan have learned ways to harness both life and death.

card.name: Boros Signet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."—Agrus Kos

card.name: Damping Matrix
card.property: Activated abilities of artifacts and creatures can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The priests tried cursing it. The mages tried dispelling it. In the end, they all obeyed it.

card.name: Dimir Signet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.

card.name: Golgari Signet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

card.name: Grafdigger's Cage
card.property: Creature cards can't enter the battlefield from graveyards or libraries. Players can't cast spells from graveyards or libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you wind up in one of mine, you can be sure as silver it will be your last."—Grafdigger Wulmer

card.name: Gruul Signet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

card.name: Izzet Signet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

card.name: Orzhov Signet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {W}{B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.

card.name: Rakdos Signet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

card.name: Selesnya Signet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.

card.name: Simic Signet
card.property: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.

card.name: Arcane Sanctum
card.property: Arcane Sanctum enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We must rely on our own knowledge, not on the dogma of the seekers or the mutterings of the sphinxes."—Tullus of Palandius

card.name: Arid Mesa
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Azorius Guildgate
card.property: Azorius Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Azorius symbol stares down like a great eye, reminding visitors of the watchful presence of Isperia and her lawmages.

card.name: Boros Guildgate
card.property: Boros Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It promises protection to those in need and proclaims a warning to any who would threaten Ravnican law.

card.name: Cavern of Souls
card.property: As Cavern of Souls enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.

card.name: Crumbling Necropolis
card.property: Crumbling Necropolis enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living."—Olcot, Rider of Joffik

card.name: Dimir Guildgate
card.property: Dimir Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the cold corridors of the undercity, misinformation unfurls from Duskmantle like a spreading stain.

card.name: Golgari Guildgate
card.property: Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every part of the gate was reclaimed from forgotten ruins and imbued with new purpose by the Swarm.

card.name: Gruul Guildgate
card.property: Gruul Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scarred rubble around the gate is testament to past meetings of the Clans, summits that inevitably devolved into brawls.

card.name: Izzet Guildgate
card.property: Izzet Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beyond lies the culmination of all Izzet projects, a grand experiment led by the dragon Niv-Mizzet himself.

card.name: Jungle Shrine
card.property: Jungle Shrine enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.

card.name: Marsh Flats
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Marsh Flats: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Misty Rainforest
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Misty Rainforest: Search your library for a Forest or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Orzhov Guildgate
card.property: Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We do not believe in hiding our wealth in the shadows. This is Orzhov, and this is how we reward greatness."—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov

card.name: Rakdos Guildgate
card.property: Rakdos Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Maze-runners who pass through the Rakdos gate leave behind their scruples and a significant amount of skin.

card.name: Savage Lands
card.property: Savage Lands enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.

card.name: Scalding Tarn
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Scalding Tarn: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Seaside Citadel
card.property: Seaside Citadel enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For wisdom's sake, it was built high to gaze on all things. For glory's sake, it was built high as a testament of power. For strength's sake, it was built high to repel all attacks.

card.name: Selesnya Guildgate
card.property: Selesnya Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Selesyna welcome all to help them heal the city's wounds. The price, however, is devotion to the guild and a selfless belief in Trostani.

card.name: Shimmering Grotto
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.

card.name: Simic Guildgate
card.property: Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Simic biomancers don't concern themselves with guarding a gate. Their ever-present creations are enough to ward off trespassers.

card.name: Verdant Catacombs
card.property: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Verdant Catacombs: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
